column2: the food runner that brought our food to the table spilled my drink all over me. Accidents happen so that is not the issue. The issue is the spill was left on the floor until we were finished eating. The server
column4: even came back to the table and didn't say a word or get it cleaned up. The guy at the opposite table slipped. Then the buser came to clear the table and looked at me like
column5: how did I make such a mess. Final straw
column6: they didn't even remove the drink from the bill that was dumped all over me. Horrible
column9: customer service with mediocre deep dish pizza.
